modName: Hino-Follower JP Custom Voice English Version
summary: This is the English version of Hino-Follower JP Custom Voice by Yamato8010, only the esp file is contained and available for downloading, as the main file is required to be downloaded first.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82999-1-1490711200.jpg[/img]﻿
First of all, you'll need the original [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82999]Hino-Followers JP Custom Voice[/url] to utilize the translation, simply overwrite the original esp with mine.
The author has granted me [url=https://twitter.com/Hino_Risa/status/1027804217585483776]PERMISSION[/url] on Twitter which basically allows me to upload this file on Nexus.
Haven't tested it myself, and I do appreciate any feedback with regards to the translation. 


Also, there're two files available for you guys to download.


The EFF version requires all three DLCs and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933]Extensible Follower Framework[/url]﻿, as it will only work when EFFCore.esm is enabled. 
The other one only requires all three DLCs.


Since I'm neither a native English speaker or a Japanese one, it's good to get some advice on how to refine the translation.



Warning: To upload this file on other sites is not permitted thus prohibited as the original author doesn't give any permission to do that.
author: Aeloyis
